availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, farmer. New Jersey native. Married to Magdalen Vorhies Bergen in Shelby County, Kentucky, in May 1808. Married to Mildred O'Bannon in Shelby County on October 9, 1856. Resident of Shelby County in 1840. Owned ten enslaved persons in Shelby County in 1840. Farmer in Shelby County in 1850. Owned seven enslaved persons in Shelby County in 1850. Farmer in Shelby County in 1860. Owned four enslaved people in Shelby County in 1860. Owned an additional one enslaved person in Henry County in 1860. Owned James [Unknown] and Jane [Unknown] in Shelby County in 1861.
